data.title: Poor Man's Horoscope
data.statement:
You have been assigned to provide "Horoscope Readings" for a bunch of people.  But that is just way too much work and it's a lot of hooey anyway.

What to do?

You use a list of 26 common <<Life-Events>> and the first 3 <<unique>> letters in the person's [[name]] to fabricate a customized "Horoscope Reading" for each person:
(1) Find the first 3 <<unique>> letters in the name.
(2) Find the position in the alphabet of each of those letters.
(3) Find the corresponding position <<Life-Event>> in the list.

Example:
For "Evelyn" the first 3 <<unique>> letters are E V and L
E is the 5th letter in the alphabet.
V is the 22th letter in the alphabet.
L is the 12th letter in the alphabet.

So her Horoscope Reading is: 
[Name exactly as it is provided]:
There will be [5th phrase in list] and [22nd phrase in list] and [12th phrase in list] in your future.

... which becomes ...

Evelyn:
There will be completion of a big project and reconciliation and illness in your future.


~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Note: Names often have spaces, hyphens, and periods (and sometimes symbols and numbers) in them: Ignore all that.  We only care about letters.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

The list of 26 common <<Life-Events>> is "altruistic acts, an award, a breakup, career change, completion of a big project, crime, disappointment, disaster, an epic experience, new love, forgiveness, illness, injury, incarceration, inspiration, investment gain, lifestyle change, a new friend, moments of wonder and clarity, a move, realizing something important, reconciliation, redemption, solving a problem, a transformative experience, a trip"

Source of the list: https://simplicable.com/en/life-events

testCases.title: Simple Name
testCases.testOut:
Frank:
There will be crime and a new friend and altruistic acts in your future.

testCases.title: Simple Name (Validator)
testCases.testOut:
Iza:
There will be an epic experience and a trip and altruistic acts in your future.

testCases.title: Repeating letters
testCases.testOut:
Evelyn:
There will be completion of a big project and reconciliation and illness in your future.

testCases.title: Repeating letters (Validator)
testCases.testOut:
Aaron:
There will be altruistic acts and a new friend and inspiration in your future.

testCases.title: Name with hyphen
testCases.testOut:
Bob-Jim:
There will be an award and inspiration and new love in your future.

testCases.title: Name with hyphen (Validator)
testCases.testOut:
Al-amir:
There will be altruistic acts and illness and injury in your future.

testCases.title: A$AP Rocky
testCases.testOut:
A$AP Rocky:
There will be altruistic acts and investment gain and a new friend in your future.

testCases.title: ! Ke$ha ! (Validator)
testCases.testOut:
! Ke$ha !:
There will be forgiveness and completion of a big project and disaster in your future.

testCases.title: Even works for aliens
testCases.testOut:
7.of.9 (of Star Trek):
There will be inspiration and crime and moments of wonder and clarity in your future.

testCases.title: Extreme (Validator)
testCases.testOut:
p.@.55w( )rd:
There will be investment gain and redemption and a new friend in your future.

testCases.title: No apology for apostrophe
testCases.testOut:
d'Artagnan:
There will be career change and altruistic acts and a new friend in your future.

testCases.title: apostrophe Validator
testCases.testOut:
O'Dowd:
There will be inspiration and career change and redemption in your future.

data.constraints:
[[name]] will have at least 3 unique letters.
[[name]] can be upper or lower case or any combination thereof.
[[name]] can contain letters, numbers, and symbols.
data.stubGenerator:
read name:string(256)
write Lisa:
There will be illness and an epic experience and moments of wonder and clarity in your future.
data.outputDescription:
Their 2 line "Horoscope Reading" as described above.
It should read as a normal sentence, including proper spacing.
